summary: Completed BTC Cascade backend testing. Module is functional with 10/11 tests passing. All core features working: guard caps (BLOCK→0, CRISIS≤0.35, WARN≤0.70), stress multiplier monotonic behavior, scenario tilt, upstream data integration. One intermittent HTTP 500 error on SPX_LOW validation endpoint.
